name: Jigsaw Puzzle Free - acapella Jigsaws Puzzles for Adults and Kids
name_original: Jigsaw Puzzle Free - acapella Jigsaws Puzzles for Adults and Kids
description:
A jigsaw puzzle is a tiling puzzle that requires the assembly of often oddly shaped interlocking and tessellating pieces. Each piece usually has a small part of a picture on it; when complete, a jigsaw puzzle produces a complete picture.

Jigsaw puzzle is great for puzzlers of all ages! Simply adjust the difficulty of the puzzle for the player.

FEATURES
+ Play from our collection of beautiful, high quality images!
+ Turn your personal photos into your own custom puzzles!
+ You can play on your iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad!
+ Optionally rotate pieces for a greater challenge
+ Saves every puzzle you've ever solved
+ Share completed puzzles with your friends
+ Constantly updated puzzle packs
